org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure
Class BandwidthReader

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.BandwidthReader

public class BandwidthReader
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a method to read the average available bandwidth for the appropriate time of day from a file, for use in OptorSim as a "realistic" input bandwidth.

Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

public static BandwidthReader getInstance()
Get an instance of the BandwidthReader. If none exists, instantiate a new BandwidthReader object; otherwise, use the existing object.

Returns:
the BandwidthReader instance.

getBandwidth

public BandwidthData getBandwidth(GridSite site1,
                                  GridSite site2,
                                  float time)
Get a BandwidthData object holding the mean and standard deviation of the bandwidth between two sites at a given time.

Parameters:
site1 - the source site
site2 - the destination site
time - the time of day for which to get the bandwidth
Returns:
BandwidthData object holding mean and standard deviation of the bandwidth for the given parameters.

readConfigFile

public void readConfigFile()
A method to get the correct data file for each link. Configuration file giving filenames corresponding to different links must be provided. If there are no data for a link, "-" should be entered in the configuration file and the default file (given in the parameters file) will be used. Histograms must be normalised. This method is called at the beginning and all data files read then, to minimise file i/o.
